title: Apple's AI and search executive Robby Walker to leave, Bloomberg News reports
description: Robby Walker, one of Apple's most senior artificial intelligence executives, is leaving the company, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.
content:
Walker's exit comes as Apple's cautious approach to AI has fueled concerns it is sitting out what could be the industry's biggest growth wave in decades.

title: Some public service jobs will be cut as Ottawa adopts AI: chief data officer
description: Ottawa's chief data officer says he thinks the introduction of artificial intelligence to federal government operations will lead to "some" job cuts in the public service.
content:

title: Big lenders are building AI agents to do the work of business bankers
description: Business banking is emerging as a key battleground in the race among the big four to build artificial intelligence tools to drive efficiency gains.
content: Major lenders are building artificial intelligence-powered “agents” – software that can do the same work as humans – in their business banking divisions, as the battle for AI supremacy in financial services intensifies despite workforce concerns abou... [269 chars]

title: Sharjah Narrative Forum Explores Future of Novels Amid AI Revolution
description: The 21st Sharjah Narrative Forum in Cairo concluded, investigating themes on artificial intelligence’s influence on narrative forms, with participation from over 60 writers across the Arab world. Discussions tackled the potential evolution of narrative elements and the future role of novels in documenting human experiences.

description: The 21st Sharjah Narrative Forum concluded its two-day programme in Egypt under the theme 'The Novel and Artificial Intelligence', with the participation of over 60 writers, academics, and critics from Egypt and across the Arab world.

title: First gallbladder surgery performed with help of AI
description: Surgeons in Chile performed a pioneering gallbladder operation with the support of a system that combines robotic technology with artificial intelligence.
content:

title: SCB trims retail banking unit amid debt avalanche
description: Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) is scaling back its retail banking business in response to the country's elevated household debt and the adoption of artificial intelligence (AI).
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Pawan Khera Defends AI Video Amid BJP Criticism
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
